content: Property Asked by AelbinAsked on 21 Aug 2019Is it good idea to stay with parents first while waiting for a BTO flat?Please see the question as above.1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Leo KwekLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 22 Aug 2019It is advisable unless staying with your parents is detrimental to your mental health :)BTO can take up to 3-4 years to build and in the meantime you can save up.If you were to rent a place, the rentals over 3-4 years can be substantial and could have gone into paying for your BTO renovation.0 comments1
